donor_name: Enhanced Integrated Framework for Trade  related  Technical Assistance  to LDC's Trust Fund manager
outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to strengthen the capacity of institutions and stakeholders to formulate and implement trade policies that support poverty reduction, inclusive economic growth and equitable sustainable development.  The project aims to support the operations and activities of the Department of Trade at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Trade, Tourism, Environment and Labour as lead agency responsible for the formulation and implementation of trade policy in Tuvalu, aligned to national development objectives.  the project will also help improe donor coordination and aid for trade delivery in line with the Paris Declaration on Aid Effectiveness.

project_descr: strengthening Tuvalu's capacity to formulate and implement trade policies; mainstream trade in the national policies and strategies; monitor and evaluate trade policy outcomes and impacts as part of the M&E framework
project_title: TV Trade Capacity Devpmnt & Institutional Strengthening
